statements: SELECT * FROM user_segmentation
SELECT user_id, content_type FROM user_segmentation WHERE interaction_count > 10
SELECT user_id, content_type, interaction_count FROM user_segmentation WHERE content_type = 'video'
SELECT user_id, interaction_count FROM user_segmentation ORDER BY last_interaction DESC
SELECT MAX(interaction_count) AS max_interaction_count FROM user_segmentation
SELECT * FROM user_segmentation WHERE interaction_count > 10 ORDER BY last_interaction DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_type FROM user_segmentation WHERE content_type = 'News' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_count FROM user_segmentation WHERE last_interaction BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_segmentation WHERE content_type IN ('Article', 'Video') ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, interaction_count, last_interaction FROM user_segmentation WHERE interaction_count > 5 AND content_type = 'Blog' ORDER BY last_interaction ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM users;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM content_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'view';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR username LIKE '%Z';
SELECT user_id, interaction_date FROM content_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM content_interaction WHERE interaction_type IN ('view', 'like') AND user_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25
SELECT content_type, category FROM content ORDER BY category DESC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 50
SELECT title FROM content WHERE content_type = 'article' LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, interaction_time FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_time ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users JOIN user_interactions ON users.user_id = user_interactions.user_id WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, content_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('view', 'share') ORDER BY user_id, interaction_type;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(content_id) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 2 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;

SELECT u.username, c.title, ui.interaction_time FROM users u JOIN user_interactions ui ON u.user_id = ui.user_id JOIN content c ON ui.content_id = c.content_id WHERE u.age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND c.category = 'tech' ORDER BY ui.interaction_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT username, segment_name FROM users LEFT JOIN user_segments ON users.user_id = user_segments.user_id WHERE segment_name IS NOT NULL;

SELECT user_id, content_type_name FROM users JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id JOIN content_types ON interactions.content_type_id = content_types.content_type_id WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, username FROM users JOIN interactions ON users.user_id = interactions.user_id GROUP BY username ORDER BY total_interactions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content_name, content_type FROM content ORDER BY content_type DESC;
SELECT user_id, segment_name FROM user_segments WHERE segment_name = 'Premium';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type LIKE 'click%' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT u.username, c.content_name FROM users u JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id JOIN content c ON i.content_id = c.content_id

SELECT u.username, c.content_name, i.interaction_type FROM users u JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id JOIN content c ON i.content_id = c.content_id WHERE i.user_id = 2 ORDER BY i.interaction_timestamp DESC

SELECT u.username, cc.category_name FROM users u JOIN interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id JOIN content c ON i.content_id = c.content_id JOIN content_categories cc ON c.content_id = cc.content_id WHERE u.user_id = 3 AND i.interaction_type = 'like'
